nodes.text: Morphometric technology was a form of technology capable of scanning starships and then altering the layout of specially designed ports to specifically fit the incoming ship. It was also capable of producing true to life effigies. The space station known as the Wheel had morphometric technology on board and during his time as administrator of the station, the droid Master-Com also used it in his private quarters to entertain the wealthiest gamblers who were visiting the station.
